column1: in memory of elier pantoja -- stygar family of funeral service| elier pantoja june 11
column3: elier-passed away peacefully with his family by his side on thursday june 11
column4: 2015. beloved husband of edith pantoja (nee perea)
column5: loving father of larry (michelle) pantoja and christine pantoja. proud and amazing grandfather of shalyn
column8: sophia and santiago. our dear brother
column11: cousin and friend to many especially our dear guardian angel ron kolowski. visitation at the stygar mid rivers funeral home & crematory
column12: 5987 mid rivers mall dr. (st. charles) on mon. jun 15 from 11:00 a. m. until 1:00 p. m. with funeral service commencing at 1:00 p. m. interment st. charles memorial gardens (st. charles)
